label: Khalaji-Pirbalouty, Valiallah & Michael J. Raupah.  2016. DNA barcoding and morphological studies confirm the occurrence of three Atarbolana (Crustacea: Isopoda: Cirolanidae) species along the coastal zone of the Persian Gulf and Gulf of Oman. Zootaxa 4200(1): 153–173.
